snippet: In Westchester, the tribulations of a family that once would have been secret no longer are.
abstract: Distressing series of events involving Kennedy family members living in the affluent northern sections of Westchester County, NY, has made public many of the clan's well-kept private woes and secrets.
lead_paragraph: In Westchester, the tribulations of a family that once would have been secret no longer are.

headline.seo: Private Lives of the Kennedys, Played Out in Public
headline.main: Private Lives of Kennedys, Played Out in Public
headline.print_headline: Westchester: Stage to View Private Lives Of Kennedys
